info.title: IoT Firmware Defense
info.description: The definitions and parameters in this swagger specification will be used to manage the IoT Firmware Defense resources.

url.description: SAS URL for creating or accessing a blob file.

UrlToken.description: Url data for creating or accessing a blob file.

Resource.title: Resource
Resource.description: Common fields that are returned in the response for all Azure Resource Manager resources (copied from common-types because of lintdiff false positives)

id.description: Fully qualified resource ID for the resource. E.g. "/subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/resourceGroups/{resourceGroupName}/providers/{resourceProviderNamespace}/{resourceType}/{resourceName}"

type.description: The type of the resource. E.g. "Microsoft.Compute/virtualMachines" or "Microsoft.Storage/storageAccounts"

systemData.description: Azure Resource Manager metadata containing createdBy and modifiedBy information.

PairedKey.description: Details of a matching paired key or certificate.

id.description: ID of the paired key or certificate.

type.description: The type indicating whether the paired object is a key or certificate.

WorkspaceNameParameter.name: workspaceName
WorkspaceNameParameter.description: The name of the firmware analysis workspace.
